DOC.brief_summary: This is a research study designed to examine the effectiveness of an obesity medication (orlistat) given in addition to behavioral weight loss therapy. Participants will be obese monolingual (Spanish-speaking only) men and women.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Behavioral Weight Loss Therapy for Obesity and Binge Eating in Monolingual Hispanic Persons
DOC.criteria: Monolingual Spanish Speaking Obese (BMI >= 30) Pregnancy Current cardiac disease Serious neurologic illnesses
